thread.section_title: HDIS Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of HDIS | www.hdis.com | 2 of 112
thread.title: Marilyn

author: Marilyn
title: Marilyn
text: Placed an order on Jan 27. Received confirmation. Checked on order on Feb 2. Got a response saying package was addressed wrong and it was being returned---it obviously was a computer mistake as whole parts of the address was omitted. Doesn't a human check addresses? -- this obviously not going to be delivered without a state, city, or even my correct name. Finally, on Feb 6, I received word that the package was being shipped by FedEx. I still have not received it . Customer Service obviously needs tweeking. They dropped the ball numerous times on this order.
